title: Start
body:
Renata: You want to hear the song I'm been working on?
Mia: Sure!
<<stop Mia>>
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<disableCollisions Renata>>
<<moveToY Mia Bed -10 50>>
<<moveToX Mia Bed -25 50>>
<<faceUp Mia>>
<<moveToY Renata Ukelele 0 50>>
<<moveToX Renata Ukelele -5 50>>
<<faceUp Mia>>
<<moveToY Ukelele Renata -5 20>>
<<moveToX Ukelele Renata 0 20>>
<<stop Ukelele>>
<<faceDown Renata>>
<<animationFrame Ukelele ukelele 2>>
<<pauseFor Renata 1.0>>
<<setBgMusic renata_practice.mp3>>
<<pauseFor Renata 20.0>>
<<stopBgMusic>>
Mia: Amazing! Can I have your autograph?
<<faceRight Renata>>
<<moveToX Ukelele Renata 5 20>>
<<moveToY Ukelele Renata 0 20>>
<<faceDown Renata>>
<<if $miawins eq 0>>
Renata: You'll have to beat me in fencing first!
<<else>>
Renata: After our rematch!
<<endif>>
<<set $secrets to $secrets + 1>>
<<attachTo Renata Mia>>
[[end]]
